gemini.title: TD-075: Household Facade Refactor
gemini.instruction: Generate a Zero-Question Spec to refactor the Household facade in simulation/core_agents.py (850+ lines). (1) Extract logic into specialized sub-components (HouseholdBio, HouseholdEcon, HouseholdSocial). (2) Implement the Facade pattern where Household delegates all calls. (3) Standardize context passing via DTOs to avoid prop-drilling or large argument lists.
